game.name: Total War: SHOGUN 2: Saints and Heroes Unit Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Valve Anti-Cheat enabled, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bolster your Sengoku-era forces with Saints and Heroes, the new Heroic Unit Pack for Total War: Shogun 2. Honed by years of relentless training and tempered in the fires of battle, these nine elite warrior units excel in their fields, and stand head-and-shoulders above their rank-and-file brothers.
